Image/Logo for Klaviyo. Just put the image in the directory which is the same as your working folder. 

R code

>getwd()
>setwd()


Use the getwd() command to see your working directory
Use the setwd() command to change your working directory

() In the paranthesis write the directory path. For eg it can be C:/Users/Microsoft/Desktop/Blah/Blah.R
